Module dragonix.fierydragons1
Package dragonix.fierydragons1.cards

Class Cave

java.lang.Object
dragonix.fierydragons1.cards.Cave
public class Cave extends Object
The Cave class represents a cave in the game, with properties such as its position, the creature occupying it, and the player occupying it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cave

      public Cave(javafx.scene.shape.Circle caveArc, Integer attachedPosition, CreatureName caveCreature)
      Constructs a Cave with the specified arc, position, and creature. The cave is marked as occupied upon creation.
      Parameters:
      caveArc - the graphical representation of the cave
      attachedPosition - the position attached to the cave
      caveCreature - the creature occupying the cave
